data.rules:
page_namespace == 6 &
(action == 'edit' | action == 'upload') &
!("#redirect" in lcase(added_lines)) &
!("#weiterleitung" in lcase(added_lines)) &
!(
  (lcase(new_wikitext) rlike '\[\[[kc]ategor[yie]') &
  (lcase(new_wikitext) rlike '{{license-rsi}}|{{self}}|{{cc-')
)
data.name: Block image uploads without category or license
